description:
With the help of young Dende, Krillin and Gohan learn they will be granted three wishes! But even as Krillin and Gohan call upon the dragon, Vegeta races to the scene on a mission to wish for immortality!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kamisama mo Ikikaetta! Super Shenron de Piccolo ga Fukkatsu
Piccolo e Kami-Sama revivem com a ajuda do Super Shenlong
พระเจ้าฟื้นคืนชีพแล้ว! ซูเปอร์เทพมังกรชุบชีวิตพิคโกโร่
神様も生き返った! 超神龍[スーパーシェンロン]でピッコロが復活
